short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace every image with Dom images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all the tab images source with a custom image url. The user could install this extension in order to have all images replaced a fun custom image.
